entry.title: New release for Stump: v0.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • â™»ï¸ Scanner and background task rewrite by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/265
  • :technologist: Migrate to Yarn by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/266
  • :adhesive_bandage: Fix dockerfile for yarn by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/267
  • ğŸ‘· Adjust CI workflows by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/275
  • âœ¨ Hide libraries from target user(s) by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/271
  • ğŸš§ Mobile App Foundations by @LRotenberger in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/282
  • âœ¨ Search entire EPUB text and vertical scroll reader by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/278
  • :recycle: Refactor image readers with more shared logic by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/285
  • :lipstick: Redesign file explorer and isolate to shared component(s) by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/286
  • :beers: POC EpubJS RN reader by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/289
  • âœ¨ Extract age rating meta for EPUB files by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/291
  • [WIP] Promote experimental changes by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/290
  • ğŸ¨ Isolate i18n to separate package by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/272
  • :pencil2: Fix typo in README.md by @yoav-lavi in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/294
  • :white_check_mark: Update failing tests by @JMicheli in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/295
  • ğŸŒ Update translations by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/293
  • :white_check_mark: Add OPDS tests to core by @JMicheli in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/301
  • ğŸŒ Update translations by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/303
  • 0.0.2 bug hunting by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/302
  • âœ¨ Arrangeable sidebar and topbar by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/308
  • :arrow_up: Pre-0.0.2 housekeeping by @JMicheli in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/305
  • 0.0.2 bug hunting (round 2) by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/312
  • ğŸŒ Update translations by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/306
  • Update main with latest develop by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/298
  • :arrow_down: Downgrade react-hook-form to 7.47.0 (#316) by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/317
  • :bookmark: Release v0.0.2 by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/313

New Contributors

  • @yoav-lavi made their first contribution in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/294

Full Changelog: https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/compare/v0.0.1...v0.0.2

entry.title: New release for Stump: v0.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ğŸŒ Update translations by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/318
  • ğŸ’š Fix yarn timeout issues during install step by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/319
  • :bug: Fix inverted swipe handlers in EPUB reader by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/324
  • :adhesive_bandage: Fix dark styles in light theme by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/326
  • :bug: Fix image reader navigation (tablet) by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/329

  • :white_check_mark: Fix stump_config tests by @JMicheli in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/331
  • ğŸŒ Update translations by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/332
  • :bug: Fix check-for-update false positive by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/333
  • Fix some series/libraries-related dead links by @PragmaTwice in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/337
  • Pre-0.0.3 fixes and testing by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/335

entry.title: New release for Stump: v0.0.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • âœ¨ Email to device by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/296

  • Image analysis job by @JMicheli in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/307

  • ğŸŒ Update translations by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/345

  • :bug: Fix OPDS path detection regression by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/350
  • Improve coverage testing and filesystem coverage by @JMicheli in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/351
  • ğŸŒ Update translations by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/352
  • :bug: Fix nested file structure support for ZIP/RAR format by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/353
  • ğŸ› Fix DB error during media analysis by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/354
  • :bug: Fix first visit API URL determination by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/358
  • :bug: Focus EPUB.js iframe each location change by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/359
  • ğŸ”– Release v0.0.4 by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/365

Full Changelog: https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/compare/v0.0.3...v0.0.4

entry.title: New release for Stump: v0.0.5
entry.content:
âš ï¸ IMPORTANT: This is the first release with binary assets included. I have only had time to test the macOS (ARM) binary, and I have discovered a bug where the default config (~/.stump/Stump.toml) is not initialized correctly. This probably affects all of them, and will be fixed by the next release. You will need to update the profile to be release and update the client_dir accordingly (by default, it should be ./client). You may also prepend the environment variables on the first run to write the config for you: bash STUMP_PROFILE=release STUMP_CLIENT_DIR=./client ./stump_server A HUGE thank you to @JMicheli to getting the binary release workflow to the finish line. If you encounter any issues, please reach out! ğŸ™‚

What's Changed

  • :sparkles: Historical read progress tracking by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/340
  • :sparkles: Page dimensions analysis task by @JMicheli in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/349
  • :globe_with_meridians: New Translations by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/363
  • Promote experimental changes by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/360
  • ğŸ‘· Add code coverage tracking by @JMicheli in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/366
  • âœ… Add core tests to improve coverage by @JMicheli in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/370
  • :globe_with_meridians: New translations by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/368
  • ğŸ‘· Release server binary by @JMicheli in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/369
  • :hammer: Update docker-compose file example in docs to remove version by @fehwalker in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/373
  • :bug: Fix basic auth password parsing breaking on : character by @fehwalker in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/375
  • :pencil2: Fix infered typo by @fehwalker in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/379
  • ğŸ› Fix bug in WebpProcessor::generate by @JMicheli in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/380
  • :construction_worker: Add macOS platform to binary release workflow by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/374
  • :bug: Fix various thumbnail generation issues by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/381
  • :bug: Fix missing scrollbar in table component by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/382
  • ğŸ”¨ Fix cargo watch tooling by @JMicheli in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/387
  • :sparkles: Add OpenDyslexic font and pave way to support other fonts by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/386
  • :bug: Fix 422 error relating to invalid user permission by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/389
  • :adhesive_bandage: Fix path filter on push by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/388
  • ğŸŒ Update translations by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/390
  • ğŸ‘· Run ci on pushes to develop by @JMicheli in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/392
  • :construction_worker: Fix codecov upload conditions in CI by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/395
  • :white_check_mark: Add tests to improve coverage by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/394
  • :construction_worker: Remote duplicate rust cache action in CI by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/396
  • ğŸ”– Release v0.0.5 by @aaronleopold in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/399

New Contributors

  • @fehwalker made their first contribution in https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/pull/373

Full Changelog: https://github.com/stumpapp/stump/compare/v0.0.4...v0.0.5
